Class Planet

java.lang.Object
  Planet

public class Planet
extends Object

Class Planet. This class represent objects which orbit a set sun.

Version:
10/3/2016
Author:
T.CHATE

Planet

public Planet(Color planetColour,
              int objectDiamter,
              int xPos,
              int yPos,
              double planetSpeed,
              Star star,
              Universe theUniverse)
Parameters:
planetColour - this specifies the colour of the planet.
xPos - this is the x coord of the planet.
yPos - this is the y coord of the planet.
Star - this is the 'central' star the planet orbits.
universe - this is the universe in which the object is present in.
